content: As you slide into the Valley of Ecstasy proper and watch the familiar Apramana Bat fly past you (provided you fought him at the Bitter Lake), you may notice you're entering a sizeable region. Luckily there's a Shrine near your landing spot, but it can be easy to get turned around and lost in this expansive valley, so we'll break it down for you:

The content is as follows:
As you slide into the Valley of Ecstasy proper and watch the familiar Apramana Bat fly past you (provided you fought him at the Bitter Lake), you may notice you're entering a sizeable region. Luckily there's a Shrine near your landing spot, but it can be easy to get turned around and lost in this expansive valley, so we'll break it down for you:
